text:
Question 136) Traffic congestion constitutes a problem that afflicts thousands of Brazilian drivers every day. The graph illustrates the situation, representing, over a timely interval of time, the speed variation of a vehicle during a congestion.
Speed ​​Time (min) 0 2 4 6 8 10 How many minutes did the vehicle remained immovable along the total time interval analyzed?
A) 4
B) 3
C) 2
D) 1
E) 0
